mention.text: Clarence Thomas , a conservative black federal judge
the federal appeals court in Washington
the federal appeals court in Washington
the federal appeals court in Washington
the federal appeals court in Washington
the federal appeals court in Washington

the ` Impeach Earl Warren ' signs which lined Highway 17 near Savannah Judge Thomas , who has been sitting on the federal appeals court in Washington for just 14 months did n't quite understand who this Earl Warren fellow was

a Catholic who spent a year in a Missouri seminary in the 1960s pondering the priesthood As other Supreme Court nominees have done , however , Judge Thomas is likely to go to great lengths to avoid committing Judge Thomas , who has been sitting on the federal appeals court in Washington for just 14 months on abortion , an issue that is expected to come before the court again and again The reaction from civil rights groups was muted Ralph Neas , executive director of the Leadership Conference on Civil Rights , said , '' With so many constitutional rights and personal liberties at stake , the Senate must make sure Clarence Thomas has demonstrated a commitment to equal opportunity and equal justice under the law ... Civil rights groups urge the Senate not to rush to judgment
Judge Thomas , who has been sitting on the federal appeals court in Washington for just 14 months on abortion , an issue that is expected to come before the court again

Judge Thomas , who has been sitting on the federal appeals court in Washington for just 14 months could not dare dream that Judge Thomas , who has been sitting on the federal appeals court in Washington for just 14 months would ever see the Supreme Court
